## HLQTStakeChange type

Represents the change between two states of an HLQT Stake.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type HLQTStakeChange<T> = {
    stakeHLQT: T;
    unstakeHLQT?: undefined;
} | {
    stakeHLQT?: undefined;
    unstakeHLQT: T;
    unstakeAllHLQT: boolean;
};
```
